articles.description: Former England cricketer Stuart Broad and England footballers Millie Bright, Mary Earps and Lauren Hemp are recognised in the New Year Honours.
articles.title: Broad and Lionesses recognised in New Year Honours

articles.description: After Arsenal's loss to West Ham and with just six points separating the top five, are we set for a classic Premier League title race?
articles.title: Deja vu for Arsenal - but which way is title race going?

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says he has not yet spoken with new co-owners Ineos because of the team's condensed schedule - but is confident of a strong relationship.
articles.title: Ten Hag confident of 'positive' Ineos relationship

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at which players are due to be competing in the Africa Cup of Nations and the Asian Cup in January.
articles.title: Which Premier League players are at Afcon & Asian Cup?

articles.description: Pat Cummins finishes with 10 wickets in the match as Australia clinch a series victory over Pakistan in Melbourne.
articles.title: Cummins leads Australia to series win over Pakistan

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton and Shed Seven singer Rick Witter predict the Premier League results.
articles.title: Sutton's Premier League predictions v Rick Witter

articles.description: The Professional Footballers' Association is exploring options around the potential for legal action over the growing number of games in the calendar.
articles.title: PFA exploring legal action over fixture congestion

articles.description: Bournemouth midfielder Hamed Traore will be out for "some time" after contracting malaria, says manager Andoni Iraola.
articles.title: Bournemouth's Traore recovering from malaria

articles.description: Real Madrid manager Carlo Ancelotti signs a new deal with the club which will run until June 2026.
articles.title: Ancelotti signs new Real Madrid deal until 2026

articles.description: Joe Flacco helps the Cleveland Browns reach the NFL play-offs then laughs off television footage appearing to show him near falling asleep on the bench.
articles.title: Flacco laughs off sleep jokes as Browns make play-offs
